items.label: 539fb60aec4f024bc1dbfc1b
items.description:
This rate is available for all domestic purposes in privately owned single or multiple unit dwellings, condominium common areas, and for churches and adjacent church owned
buildings used for religious or residential purposes.

A $4.50 discount applies to customers who have installed an electric water heater of an approved type. Customers who are engaged in the business of agriculture or farming as defined by MGL at their service location are eligible for a discount from their distribution rates. The discount will be calculated at 10% of the retail delivery service charge plus energy charges if applicable to the total service charge rendered to the customer.
items.energycomments: The rate shown is the sum of the distribution, transmission, generation, and energy charges.
items.name: RESIDENTIAL A1 RATE
items.utility: Town of North Attleborough, Massachusetts (Utility Company)
